price: សូមស្បថនឹងអល់ឡោះថាៈ ប្រាកដណាស់ ពួកយើងពិត ជាធ្លាប់បានស្ថិតក្នុងភាពវងេ្វងយ៉ាងច្បាស់
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
